column4: Guys I cant find anywhere (help or forum) how to format dvd/cd rw??
heard you and will do, making comment only tks for info
Norton ghost for Ubuntu deluxe Version.14
no thats too major, all thats needed is to restore some settings back as before (besides I hate Norton)
so on boot I type 'apt-restore previous-state 04' is that correct?
no thats not correct, jsut im getting your idea
you cant restore states... switch to IMac i heard they have a pansy flower restore system
OK I have backed up using Simple Backup Config. But seems a bit after the fact if you cannot get back to desktop
are you suggesting Ubuntu should be a copy of Windows?
not at all, and I would hate that, but there are just a few good things in windows that I'm used to
dont use backups, thats weak, learn to config and mantain your system, voila!
